preqs: Any one of the following units: ATS3010, ATS3030, ATS3011, ATS3031, ATS3012, ATS3032, ATS3014, ATS3034, ATS3041, ATS3042, ATS2015, ATS2035, ATS2016, ATS2036, ATS3015, ATS3035, ATS3016, ATS3036 or by permission.

rules.ruleString: Incompatible with (I/W) {ATS3033, ATS4013, ATS4033, CHI1450, CHI1945, CHI2450, CHI2945, CHI3945, CHI4450, CHI4459, CHI5450, CHI5945}

For commencement date before `01-JAN-2014` Do true Otherwise Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ATS2015, ATS2016, ATS2035, ATS2036, ATS3010, ATS3011, ATS3012, ATS3014, ATS3015, ATS3016, ATS3030, ATS3031, ATS3032, ATS3034, ATS3035, ATS3036, ATS3041, ATS3042}

description: This unit provides students with Chinese language training in a business and commerce context.  By exposing students to a specialised business text style, students who wish to further improve their Chinese language proficiency can have an opportunity to grasp the language features of business texts and practice writing and translating related texts, thus developing their current bilingual language proficiency as well as broadening their career opportunities.
